properties.title: TauP - Flexible Seismic Travel Time Utilities

section.name: Maven TauP Pages
section.p: Looking to develop code on top of TauP or use it as a library? You've come to the right place! These are the developer pages for TauP. If you're looking to download a release of TauP or find out what it is, go to its real home page instead. These pages contain the source for various TauP releases and the JavaDocs for the latest release of TauP. You may also be interested in the source as it stands in subversion, which you can get from fisheye.

body.section: YourKit is kindly supporting open source projects with its full-featured Java Profiler. YourKit, LLC is creator of innovative and intelligent tools for profiling Java and .NET applications. Take a look at YourKit's leading software products: YourKit Java Profiler and YourKit .NET Profiler.
